column2: <dt lang="en">Appetite - Have you been eating well?</dt>
<dt lang="en">Weight - Have you lost or gained weight lately?</dt>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_NEW">zuì jìn féi lè hái shì shòu lè </dd>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_OLD">zuì jìn féi lè hái shì shòu lè </dd>
<dd lang="yue-Latn_OLD">Yau mou sau di / fei di?</dd>
<dd lang="nan-Latn_OLD">Ler wu ga san bo / pui bo?</dd>
<dt lang="en">General well-being - How are you feeling?</dt>
<dd lang="yue-Latn_OLD">Hou ma? Gok tak dim yong?</dd>
<dd lang="nan-Latn_OLD">Ler eh sian bue / bo lat bue?</dd>
<dt lang="en">Fever - Have you got a fever?</dt>
<dd lang="nan-Latn_OLD">Ler wu di di lau knua bo?</dd>
<dt lang="en">Rash - Have you had any rash recently?</dt>
<dd lang="cmn-Hans">你最近有没有发现红斑？</dd>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_NEW">nî zuì jìn yôu méi yôu fä xiãn hóng bän</dd>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_OLD">nî zuì jìn yôu méi yôu fä xiãn hóng bän</dd>
<dd lang="nan-Latn_OLD">Gun lai peh hu eh ang ang bue?</dd>
<dt lang="en">Does it itch? Do you scratch?</dt>
<dd lang="nan-Latn_OLD">Eh jniu bue? Wu bei bo?</dd>
<dt lang="en">Lumps and bumps - Have you noticed any lumps and bumps?</dt>
<dd lang="yue-Latn_OLD">Yau mou bin dou zong / sang lau?</dd>
<dd lang="nan-Latn_OLD">Ler wu doh loh zeng ki lai bo?</dd>
<dt lang="en">Radiation - Does it hurt anywhere else?</dt>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_NEW">qí tä dì fäng tòng mä </dd>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_OLD">qí tä dì fäng tòng mä </dd>
<dd lang="ms">adakah kesakitan itu merebak ke bahagian lain?</dd>
<dd lang="yue-Latn_OLD">Zong yau bin dou tong ma?</dd>
<dt lang="en">Severity - Does it interfere with your activity?</dt>
<dd lang="cmn-Hans">有没有干扰你的日常生活？</dd>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_NEW">yôu méi yôu gän râo nî dè rì cháng shëng huó? </dd>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_OLD">yôu méi yôu gän râo nî dè rì cháng shëng huó? </dd>
<dd lang="yue-Latn_OLD">Zou ye yau mou kuan nan?</dd>
<dd lang="nan-Latn_OLD">Li eh sai zo talit zo eh mi kia bue?</dd>
<dt lang="en">Does it keep you awake at night?</dt>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_NEW">huì bú huì tòng dão bù néng shuì</dd>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_OLD">huì bú huì tòng dão bù néng shuì</dd>
<dd lang="yue-Latn_OLD">Ye man tong, fan tak ma?</dd>
<dd lang="nan-Latn_OLD">An meh tnia hor, kun eh loh bue?</dd>
<dt lang="en">Timing - When does it come? / When does it go?</dt>
<dd lang="cmn-Hans">什么时候痛？什么时候不痛?</dd>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_NEW">shên mè shí hòu tòng? shên mè shí hòu bù tòng?</dd>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_OLD">shên mè shí hòu tòng? shên mè shí hòu bù tòng?</dd>

<dd lang="yue-Latn_OLD">Gei sih tong? Gei sih mm tong?</dd>

<dd lang="cmn-Latn_OLD">däng tái döng xï dè shí hòu</dd>

<dd lang="cmn-Latn_NEW">téng tòng shì shén mè shí hòu käi shî dè</dd>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_OLD">téng tòng shì shén mè shí hòu käi shî dè</dd>
<dd lang="yue-Latn_OLD">Lei ge tong gei si hoi chi?</dd>

<dd lang="cmn-Latn_OLD">yî jïng tòng duö jîu lè</dd>

<dd lang="nan-Latn_OLD">Si mm si jin jia tnia?</dd>
<dt lang="en">Occurrence - is it present all the time or is it intermittent?</dt>

<dd lang="nan-Latn_OLD">Di di tnia ga si tnia go teng, tnia go teng</dd>
